KFunction.Name: k2_Createfile
KFunction.Desc: This function will create a physical file based on an input string.

Input.name: i_fileContent
Input.Comment: The string to create the file based on

Input.name: i_name
Input.Comment: The name of the file to be created

Input.name: i_location
Input.Comment: The location where to place the file in

Input.name: i_append
Input.Comment: If set to 1, the content of the i_fileContent will be appended to an existing file
